entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
